import React, { useState } from 'react' import { assets } from '../../assets/assets' import './food.css' const Food_Item = ({id,name,price,description,image}) => { const [itemCount,setItemCount]=useState(0) return (
{ !itemCount?setItemCount(prev=>prev+1)} src={assets.add_icon_white} alt=""/>:

{itemCount}

}

{name}

{description}

${ price}

) } export default Food_Item
